description: A URL Redirection to Untrusted Site vulnerability exists in the embedded web servers in all Modicon M340, Premium, Quantum PLCs and BMXNOR0200 where a user clicking on a specially crafted link can be redirected to a URL of the attacker's choosing.

product.name: Embedded Web Servers in all Modicon M340, Premium, Quantum PLCs and BMXNOR0200

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Embedded Web Servers in all Modicon M340, Premium, Quantum PLCs and BMXNOR0200
